content: In time, as you connect with more planets, you'll obtain more Luca Fruit to use to embellish your planet.
info: 镶嵌露卡之心-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A想象}Hoho! It almost feels like the Luca Fruit has... woven a brand-new coat for the planet.
info: 镶嵌露卡之心-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: The <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit</style> of each planet is formed from that planet's own unique Luca essence. To possess one is to share in that planet's distinctive landscape and charm.
info: 镶嵌露卡之心-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
